item.title: GA4 Migration Guide: Your Complete Transition Roadmap
item.description: With Universal Analytics officially sunset in July 2023, the migration to Google Analytics 4 (GA4) isn’t just recommendedâ€”it’s essential. This comprehensive guide walks you through every step of the transition, ensuring you don’t lose valuable data or tracking capabilities. Understanding GA4: The New Analytics Paradigm Google Analytics 4 represents a fundamental shift in how we collect, process, and analyze digital data. Built on an event-based model rather than the session-based approach of Universal Analytics, GA4 provides more flexibility and deeper insights into user behavior across platforms.
